name: photo-picture-of-the-day-july-17-2008
title: <strike>Photo</strike> Picture Of The Day: July 17, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: There are more ways to capture Nashville than through photos. That’s why we decided to change things up a bit today and bring you a painting by local artist and geek, Brad Blackman. If you like this one as much as we did, check out Brad’s other work at www.bradblackman.com.
contentEncoded: There are more ways to capture Nashville than through photos. That’s why we decided to change things up a bit today and bring you a painting by local artist and geek, Brad Blackman. If you like this one as much as we did, check out Brad’s other work at www.bradblackman.com.
